file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"
  contact:
    name: Кравченков Александр
    email: kravchenkov@surfstudio.ru

paths:

  /auth:
    post:
      summary: Метод для отправки логина и пароля на сервер. Первый фактор авторизации.
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              oneOf:
                - $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/AuthRequest"
                - $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/SilentAuthRequest"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Успех"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/AuthResponse"
            
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /auth: post: requestBody: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: oneOf: [0]: parse schema: resolve "models.yaml#/components/schemas/AuthRequest": find schema: external base "models.yaml" is not supported
